LanguageData.EM_FWMoth.label: featherwing moth
LanguageData.EM_FWMoth.description: The adult stage of the featherwing grubs life. A beautiful iridescent green moth that lives for at most a couple of days - but is a terrible pest and will destroy crops if given a chance.
LanguageData.EM_FWMoth.tools.1.label: head
